# Templates

This directory contains templates used by Claude Conductor to generate project files.

## Overview

Templates use `{{PLACEHOLDER}}` syntax for variable substitution. When a command generates a file, it replaces placeholders with actual values from user input, project detection, or computed data.

## Template Files

### product.md.template

**Purpose:** Defines the product vision, goals, and constraints.
**Generated by:** `/conductor:setup`
**Location:** `conductor/product.md`

| Placeholder | Description | Source |
|-------------|-------------|--------|
| `{{PROJECT_NAME}}` | Project name | Q1 or detected |
| `{{VISION}}` | 1-2 sentence vision | Q2 |
| `{{PROBLEM_STATEMENT}}` | Problem being solved | Derived from Q2-Q3 |
| `{{TARGET_USERS}}` | Who the product is for | Derived from Q3 |
| `{{VALUE_PROPOSITION}}` | Core value | Derived from answers |
| `{{KEY_FEATURES}}` | Main features | Derived from context |
| `{{SUCCESS_METRICS}}` | How success is measured | Generated |
| `{{CONSTRAINTS}}` | Boundaries and limitations | Generated |
| `{{DATE}}` | Generation date | Auto |

---

### product-guidelines.md.template

**Purpose:** Quality standards and review checklist.
**Generated by:** `/conductor:setup`
**Location:** `conductor/product-guidelines.md`

| Placeholder | Description | Source |
|-------------|-------------|--------|
| `{{DESIGN_PHILOSOPHY}}` | Design principles | Q9 selections |
| `{{UX_PRINCIPLES}}` | User experience rules | Derived |
| `{{TESTING_REQUIREMENTS}}` | Testing approach | Q7 |
| `{{DOCUMENTATION_REQUIREMENTS}}` | Doc standards | Generated |
| `{{ACCESSIBILITY_STANDARDS}}` | A11y requirements | Q9 if selected |
| `{{PERFORMANCE_GUIDELINES}}` | Perf targets | Q9 if selected |
| `{{SECURITY_REQUIREMENTS}}` | Security rules | Q9 if selected |
| `{{DATE}}` | Generation date | Auto |

### tracks.md.template

**Purpose:** Registry of all feature tracks.
**Generated by:** `/conductor:setup`, updated by `/conductor:newTrack`
**Location:** `conductor/tracks.md`

| Placeholder | Description | Source |
|-------------|-------------|--------|
| `{{ACTIVE_TRACK}}` | Currently active track | From .active_track |
| `{{TRACK_ROWS}}` | Table rows of tracks | Generated |
| `{{DATE}}` | Last update date | Auto |

---

### spec.md.template

**Purpose:** Feature specification document.
**Generated by:** `/conductor:newTrack`
**Location:** `conductor/tracks/<track-id>/spec.md`

| Placeholder | Description | Source |
|-------------|-------------|--------|
| `{{TITLE}}` | Feature title | User input |
| `{{TRACK_ID}}` | Unique track identifier | Generated |
| `{{STATUS}}` | draft → approved | State |
| `{{DATE}}` | Creation date | Auto |
| `{{AUTHOR}}` | Who created it | User |
| `{{SUMMARY}}` | 2-3 sentence overview | Generated |
| `{{BACKGROUND}}` | Context and history | Generated |
| `{{GOALS}}` | What to achieve | Generated |
| `{{NON_GOALS}}` | Explicit exclusions | Generated |
| `{{USER_STORIES}}` | As a user, I want... | Generated |
| `{{FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS}}` | FR-1, FR-2, etc. | Generated |
| `{{NON_FUNCTIONAL_REQUIREMENTS}}` | Performance, security | Generated |
| `{{TECHNICAL_APPROACH}}` | High-level approach | Generated |
| `{{AFFECTED_COMPONENTS}}` | Files to modify | Generated |
| `{{DEPENDENCIES}}` | External/internal deps | Generated |
| `{{RISKS}}` | Risks and mitigations | Generated |
| `{{OPEN_QUESTIONS}}` | Unresolved questions | Generated |
| `{{ACCEPTANCE_CRITERIA}}` | Testable criteria | Generated |

---

### plan.md.template

**Purpose:** Phased execution plan with tasks.
**Generated by:** `/conductor:newTrack`
**Location:** `conductor/tracks/<track-id>/plan.md`

| Placeholder | Description | Source |
|-------------|-------------|--------|
| `{{TITLE}}` | Feature title | From spec |
| `{{TRACK_ID}}` | Track identifier | From spec |
| `{{STATUS}}` | draft → approved | State |
| `{{DATE}}` | Creation date | Auto |
| `{{OVERVIEW}}` | Implementation summary | Generated |
| `{{PHASES}}` | All phases with tasks | Generated |
| `{{PROGRESS_TABLE}}` | Progress summary table | Generated |
| `{{COMMIT_LOG}}` | List of commits | Updated by implement |

---

### metadata.json.template

**Purpose:** Machine-readable track state.
**Generated by:** `/conductor:newTrack`
**Location:** `conductor/tracks/<track-id>/metadata.json`

| Placeholder | Description | Source |
|-------------|-------------|--------|
| `{{TRACK_ID}}` | Track identifier | Generated |
| `{{TITLE}}` | Feature title | User input |
| `{{STATUS}}` | ready, in-progress, etc. | State |
| `{{DATE}}` | Creation/update date | Auto |
| `{{BRANCH}}` | Git branch name | Generated |
| `{{AUTHOR}}` | Creator | User |
| `{{PHASE_COUNT}}` | Number of phases | From plan |
| `{{TASK_COUNT}}` | Number of tasks | From plan |

---

## Customization

To customize templates:

1. Edit the `.template` file in this directory
2. Add or modify placeholders as needed
3. Update the generation code to populate new placeholders

**Note:** Changes to templates only affect newly generated files, not existing ones.

## Placeholder Syntax

- Use double curly braces: `{{PLACEHOLDER_NAME}}`
- Names should be UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
- Keep names descriptive: `{{PROJECT_NAME}}` not `{{PN}}`
